text: Hagi zamagima kre'za eri fatgo hu'za avontafepima krenazana, Jeria'a Hebroni nagamofo kva mani'ne. Hagi Devitima kinima mani'no'ma e'nea kafumo'ma 40'a kafuma nehigeno'a, vahe zamagima kre'nea avontafepima ke'za erifore'ma hazana, marerirfa antahi'zane vahera, Hebroni vahetami Jazeri kumate Giliati mopafi mani'naze.
